credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
dimensions: Overall: 40.6 x 22.9 cm (16 x 9 in.) each piece
title: Bodice fronts
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: trapunto, open-work and embroidery
description: Two shaped bodice fronts with six extended tabs for lacing, in white linen with white embroidery, open-work embroidery and trapunto (stuffed quilting) in a pattern of scrolling flowers and leaves.
name: Bodice fronts
